name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
DevOps Engineer with 13+ years of experience in deploying and managing high-performance applications across diverse industries, including healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Azure**, **AWS**, **CI/CD**, and adept at utilizing **Terraform**, **Docker**, and **Kubernetes** to optimize cloud-native environments. Skilled in implementing Infrastructure as Code (IAC) using **ARM**, **Bicep**, and **CloudFormation** to enhance deployment efficiency.
Experienced in setting up observability tools like **Prometheus**, **Grafana**, and **OpenTelemetry**, as well as monitoring solutions such as **Azure Monitor** and **CloudWatch**. Strong knowledge of automation and scripting with **Bash** and **Python**, aligned with Agile methodologies for continuous improvement and adaptive planning.
Additionally, I bring hands-on expertise in building AI/ML-powered platforms, adapting innovative solutions to fulfill compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS. My solid background in microservices and event-driven architectures enhances operational performance and system scalability.
